title: Slap Battles: How to Get Alchemist Glove + Containment Badge

steps.title: Equip the Plague glove.
steps.content: Equip the Plague glove. This glove is obtained from the Infected badge, which can be earned by getting slapped by another player who is infected or is using the Plague or Zombie glove. [1] X Research source You can also equip the Zombie glove instead, but this glove is only available after you've been killed by another Zombie or a Necromancer.

steps.title: Enter the Normal Arena.
steps.content: Enter the Normal Arena. This is the red arena, on the left. The Containment Breach badge can be obtained on a public or private server; you'll just need at least 10 people.

steps.title: In one life, kill 10 different users.
steps.content: In one life, kill 10 different users. You must use your Plague (or Zombie) ability. When you get the notification for obtaining the Containment Breach badge, you'll find the Alchemist glove in the lobby.

steps.title: "Summon Cauldron" can be used to brew potions.
steps.content: "Summon Cauldron" can be used to brew potions. As the name suggests, Alchemist glove users can summon a cauldron that can be used to brew potions with different abilities. These potions can be consumed by the user or thrown at enemy players. Potion ingredients can be found around the island.
